events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product I got completely differs from what I ordered.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to product discrepancy reported by the customer in the initial message.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request for the incorrect product delivered.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. I’m here to help you get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number? This will help us process your refund faster.
Attached are the pictures of the wrong product I got, along with my order confirmation number as requested.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send you a prepaid label to return the wrong item.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I’m glad this is being handled so efficiently.
The refund has been processed, and the return label has been sent to your email. Please finalize the return at your earliest convenience.
Just following up to check if you have successfully returned the item and received your refund without any issues.
I’ve mailed the return package yesterday and confirmed the refund was credited back to my account. Thanks again!
Glad to hear everything is settled. We’re closing your case now. Feel free to reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
